title: Dear Mystery Guy
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B00TOYKA62Della Gold details her life in a journal dedicated to a mystery guy she had only seen at her workplace but whom she felt curiously drawn toward.  When fascination turns into obsession she finds herself wanting to learn more about him but in her pursuit of the mystery guy she begins to learn more about herself and her mysterious past...
author: Brenda Barrett
